reviews.text:
I love the OKKO gas station, it's convenient and close to home, but this YAMA is terrible. I (and my neighbors and acquaintances from the area) do not want to stop here 4 out of 5 times, only as a last resort... there are more convenient gas stations nearby.
I see the disclaimer that this is not your pit, BUT this is the only exit from YOUR gas station, it would really be very telling if you yourself approached the pit owner and made the exit from the gas station comfortable. I bet UAH 50 that it will increase your visits and income. Honestly and sincerely, your client is already four years old.

I have been coming to this gas station for several years and not in the same car. I used to fill up with gas here, but for the last six months I've been filling up with Diesel Pulse, and I have no complaints about the fuel. But the hole at the exit from the gas station turned into a tunnel to the other side of the Earth)) Yesterday I hit a threshold in that place, although my car is not low. Remove the brick and we will leave through the entrance if the hole is beyond your strength.

Evaluation of the level of service. Discounted goods were sold on the shelves. At the checkout, it turned out that it costs almost twice as much. After checking the price on the price tag, the cashier simply said that there is no product for the price indicated on the price tag, and that the price tag was accidentally placed under another product. The cashier refused to sell the product at a discount, for the price indicated on the price tag, although she should have sold it according to the legislation of Ukraine. It seems that it is the buyer's fault that the product was missing, and the price tag did not correspond to the value of the product. In general, this gas station has a very low level of service. Those components that the buyer asks not to add can be added to the hot dog. It often happens that there is a queue, and free cashiers are not working. I do not recommend this gas station.

On 12/07/23 I filled up half a tank, after a few kilometers the engine stopped revving and began to stall harshly. I read the reviews and won't come here anymore. And the hole is really huge, I caught it with the threshold, didn’t notice any signs of falling asleep, well, it’s not their road, it’s just an exit to the highway through it, it happens))

A month ago, I refueled here with a full tank (in general, I only refueled at Okko for 10 months). They began to rev, troit, stall, black smoke from the exhaust pipe. I had to go to the service station on a tow truck. The conclusion is "don't refuel there anymore, it's all fuel." It's a pity, because I wanted to support through "an eye for an eye". Goodbye Okko.
